Evanston.Chicago Math and Science Academy: Chicago Math and Science Academy (CMSA) is a public charter middle school and high school (grades 6th-12th) located in Chicago, Illinois in the Rogers Park neighborhood. CMSA is ranked by the Chicago Public Schools Board as a Level 1+ school, according to their School Quality Report The majority of students (94%) come from low-income families. Chicago Math and Science Academy was opened in 2004.
